brand.name: Hot Beam Productions
brand.valueProposition: Technical production for live events that need to run right the first time.

seo.defaultTitle: Hotbeam Productions | Technical Event Lighting, Video & Lasers
seo.description: Colorado-based production company specializing in intelligent concert lighting, high-resolution video walls, and variance-approved laser operations for tours, corporate events, and live venues.
keywords: denver concert lighting and laser production
festival and nightclub production boulder denver

hero.departmentLine: Lighting Architecture · Class IV Lasers · LED Video Walls
hero.description: Specialized production partner delivering precision-engineered systems, meticulous maintenance standards, and 24/7 technical support.
hero.headline: Technical Event Lighting, Video & Laser Engineering
hero.subheadline: Precision-engineered lighting architecture, high-resolution video walls, and variance-approved laser operations. Deploying rider-compliant visual infrastructure for touring artists, corporate activations, and high-capacity events nationwide.

services.label: Capabilities
services.title: Built For Demanding Shows
services.subtitle: Specialists in each department plan it, build it, and run it on show day.

items.title: Lighting
items.description: Show lighting for both live audience and camera, built for real run-of-show conditions.

items.title: Video
items.description: End-to-end LED, IMAG, and playback systems with reliable routing, switching, and processing.

items.title: Lasers
items.description: Variance-compliant laser production with strict safety controls and clean cue sync.

items.title: SFX
items.description: CO2, haze, confetti, and atmospherics timed to lighting cues.

closingCta.title: Need a Rider-Compliant Visual Deployment Plan?
closingCta.description: Send your venue specs, schedule, and performance requirements. Our operations team will return a scoped deployment plan with crew, hardware, and risk controls.

trustSignals: 24/7 technical support for touring and venue teams

heading.label: The Company
heading.title: Built By Operators
heading.subtitle: A technical team that plans thoroughly, communicates clearly, and executes under pressure.

story: Hot Beam was built by working show crew. We started the company to provide accurate prep, reliable systems, and accountable leadership.
The same team that plans your project runs your show. Fewer handoffs means clearer communication and fewer surprises.
We support promoters, agencies, venues, and production managers with practical plans and clear pricing.

values.title: Technical Rigor
values.description: We read riders carefully, model systems before load-in, and document every step.

values.title: Single-Team Accountability
values.description: The team that scopes your show is the team that delivers it. Fewer layers, faster decisions.

values.title: Creative Discipline
values.description: Design decisions follow show goals, sightlines, camera needs, and cue timing.

partners.name: Daniel Mankin
partners.bio: Daniel leads system architecture, laser operations, and show programming. He is FDA LSO certified.

partners.name: Beau
partners.bio: Beau leads logistics, crew operations, and site execution. He keeps schedules, vendors, and staffing aligned from prep through strike.

closingCta.title: Need A Production Team That Can Execute?
closingCta.description: Send your venue, timeline, and goals. We will return a practical technical plan and budget path.

heading.label: Inventory
heading.title: Show-Ready Equipment
heading.subtitle: Core inventory available as dry hire or bundled with technical labor and transportation.

rentals.footerNote: Need a complete list? Request the current inventory sheet and package pricing.

items.name: 6.5 x 9.8ft Premium LED Video Wall System (2.8mm) with Novastar VX400
items.description: Transform your stage architecture with our broadcast-ready 6.5 x 9.8ft LED Video Wall package. Featuring a high-density 2.8mm pixel pitch and a staggering 3840Hz refresh rate, this 24-panel modular system guarantees absolutely flicker-free performance on camera and stunning visual clarity for live audiences. To ensure flawless operation, this package includes the industry-standard Novastar VX400 all-in-one controller. With a 2.9 million pixel loading capacity, four Gigabit Ethernet outputs, and SuperView III stepless scaling, the VX400 provides seamless video processing, allowing you to map, crop, and scale your visual content effortlessly.
specs: Diode Type / Density: SMD1515 / 123,904 pixels per sqm
VX400 Data Outputs: 4x Gigabit Ethernet, 2x Fiber OPT

items.name: Able Archer 20W RGB Laser Projector (FB4 Integrated)
items.description: Command the skyline and dominate festival stages with the Able Archer 20W RGB Laser. Engineered for mega-scale events, this IP65-rated weatherproof projector delivers an immense 20,000mW of pristine laser energy. With an integrated Pangolin FB4 media server, you can trigger complex shows, liquid skies, and custom animations directly via Art-Net, sACN, or Ethernet without the need for cumbersome ILDA cables. The projector features a razor-tight <1.2mrad beam divergence for extreme long-throw visibility and utilizes 30Kpps high-speed scanners for perfectly smooth geometric rendering.
specs: Laser Diode Distribution: 6.4W Red, 6.4W Green, 8W Blue
Control Interfaces: FB4, Art-Net, Ethernet, DMX, ILDA

items.name: High-Power 10W RGB Laser Projector
items.description: Deliver stunning aerial effects and precise geometric animations with our High-Power 10W RGB Laser. Perfectly scaled for mid-sized indoor venues and high-energy nightclub environments, this projector utilizes high-performance analog modulation for infinite, smooth color blending. Equipped with professional 30Kpps high-speed scanners and a tight <1.5mrad beam divergence, the unit ensures sharp, flicker-free graphics. Control your show your way with support for ILDA, DMX512, and automatic sound-active modes.
specs: Laser Diode Distribution: 3W Red, 3W Green, 4W Blue
Control Interfaces: ILDA, DMX512, Auto, Sound

items.name: Alpha Theta CDJ-3000x Professional DJ Multi Player
items.description: Step into the booth with the undisputed global standard in DJ performance technology. The Alpha Theta CDJ-3000x is driven by an advanced multi-core MPU, ensuring lightning-fast track loading and flawless performance reliability. Navigate your sets intuitively on the massive 10.1-inch capacitive touchscreen, and experience unparalleled sonic purity thanks to the onboard ESS 32-bit DAC, which delivers a breathtaking 115 dB signal-to-noise ratio. With Gigabit PRO DJ LINK networking, dual USB-C ports, and Wi-Fi capability for CloudDirectPlay, the CDJ-3000x is built to command the world's largest festival stages.
specs: Connectivity: Gigabit PRO DJ LINK, Wi-Fi, USB-C

items.name: Pioneer DJ DJM-A9 4-Channel Professional Mixer
items.description: The heartbeat of the modern DJ booth. The Pioneer DJ DJM-A9 is a next-generation 4-channel mixer engineered for absolute sonic excellence. Utilizing 32-bit ESS Technology A/D and D/A converters, it delivers crystal-clear, high-resolution audio to both the dancefloor and the booth monitors. Designed for seamless artist transitions, the A9 features dual independent headphone outputs for effortless back-to-back sets, a phantom-powered microphone input for studio-grade condenser mics, and an expanded Sound Color FX section. Integrated Bluetooth and Wi-Fi capabilities ensure you are always connected, making this the ultimate mixing hub for any professional deployment.

items.name: Artfox IPStrobe M Motorized Strobe & Wash (IP65)
items.description: Deliver devastating visual impact with the Artfox IPStrobe M. Comparable to the legendary Colorstrike M, this IP65-rated motorized strobe and wash fixture is built to withstand the harshest outdoor festival conditions. It features a blistering 1176W cool-white central strobe tube surrounded by a rich 392W RGB background wash panel, allowing for aggressive strobe blasts and saturated color washes from a single unit. With a lightning-fast 185-degree motorized tilt, full pixel mapping capabilities, and seamless Art-Net/DMX control, the IPStrobe M is the ultimate dynamic effect luminaire.
specs: Light Source Engine: 1176W White Strobe / 392W RGB
Color Generation: RGB Wash + Pure White Strobe
Control Protocols: Art-Net, sACN, DMX, RDM

items.name: Artfox Matrix Hybrid CMY 460 Moving Head
items.description: Maximize your lighting rig's potential with the Artfox Matrix Hybrid CMY 460. This powerful all-in-one moving head is driven by a 460W Cool White LED engine and features a motorized linear zoom ranging from a piercing 4° beam to a broad 30° wash. Engineered for professional lighting designers, it offers incredibly smooth CMY subtractive color mixing, variable CTO/CTB color temperature correction, dual rotating prisms, and dynamic gobo wheels. Whether you need sharp mid-air aerial effects, textured stage spots, or even color washes, the Hybrid CMY 460 delivers uncompromising performance.
specs: Light Source Engine: 460W Cool White LED (8000K)
Color Generation: CMY Mixing + Variable CTO/CTB

items.name: Artfox Solar 7 Moving Zoom Wash
items.description: Fast, compact, and incredibly bright. The Artfox Solar 7 Moving Wash features seven potent 40W RGBW LEDs capable of producing brilliant, perfectly blended colors. Its motorized linear zoom effortlessly transitions the beam angle from a tight 6° column of light to a wide 45° stage wash, making it an incredibly versatile tool for any rig. Thanks to its lightweight design and advanced 3-phase motors, the Solar 7 executes lightning-fast pan and tilt movements, ensuring it keeps pace with the most demanding, high-energy light shows.
specs: Ingress Protection: IP20 / IP65 Variants Available

items.name: Cryogenic CO2 Cannon Jet (Includes 75lb Siphon Tank)
items.description: Deliver massive, stadium-shaking energy with our professional Cryogenic CO2 Cannons. Engineered to blast dense, ice-cold plumes of white fog up to 35 feet in the air, these jets are the ultimate special effect for beat drops and grand entrances. The fog dissipates instantly, leaving the stage completely clear. To ensure you achieve the perfect cryogenic flash, this rental package includes one fully loaded 75lb Siphon CO2 tank per cannon, providing approximately 135 seconds of total output time. Fully DMX controllable for precise, synchronized firing.
specs: Consumable Required: Liquid CO2 (75lb Siphon Tank)

items.name: Artfox 1500W Professional Hazer
items.description: Maximize the visual impact of your entire lighting and laser rig with the Artfox 1500W Professional Hazer. Unlike standard foggers, this touring-grade hazer outputs a fine, long-lasting mist at a massive 38,000 cubic feet per minute, perfectly illuminating mid-air light beams without smoking out your performers. Built into a rugged flight case, it features a 5-angle adjustable output baffle to work seamlessly with your venue's air currents. It heats up in just 60 seconds and offers full DMX512 control for precise atmospheric management.
specs: Output Volume: 38,000 cubic feet per minute
Consumable Required: Professional Haze Fluid (6L Tank)

items.name: 3m (9.84ft) F34 Aluminum Square Truss
items.description: The industry standard for safe, heavy-duty rigging. Our 3-meter F34 290mm square trussing is constructed from high-strength aluminum with 50mm main tubes and a 2mm wall thickness, guaranteeing maximum load-bearing capacity for your lighting and video walls. Features quick-lock conical couplers for rapid, secure deployment.

items.name: 1.5m (4.92ft) F34 Aluminum Square Truss
items.description: Highly versatile 1.5-meter F34 square truss segment. Built to the same rigorous 50mm/2mm tubing standards as our longer spans, this half-size segment is perfect for creating custom grid dimensions, vertical totems, or adjusting the height of goal-post arches. Includes conical coupling hardware.

items.name: F34 6-Way Junction Corner Block
items.description: Build complex 3D grids and arches effortlessly. This heavy-duty 6-way junction block allows you to connect F34 truss segments in up to six different directions simultaneously, providing ultimate structural flexibility.

items.name: 3x3ft Heavy-Duty F34 Base Plate
items.description: Ensure absolute stability for your freestanding truss totems. This massive 3x3-foot aluminum base plate provides a wide center of gravity, preventing heavy moving heads from tipping your vertical columns.

items.name: 2x2ft F34 Base Plate
items.description: A compact but highly stable 2x2-foot base plate designed to safely support standard vertical F34 truss totems holding lightweight lighting fixtures or TV monitors.

items.name: 1x1ft F34 Top Plate
items.description: Mount your moving heads or laser projectors safely atop any vertical F34 truss totem. This 1x1-foot top plate provides a perfectly flat, secure mounting surface.

items.name: 24-inch Truss Arm Extension Pole (Boom Arm)
items.description: Maximize your rigging space. This 24-inch aluminum extension pole features dual self-locking clamps that attach securely to a 2-inch truss tube, allowing you to hang fixtures out and away from the main span to achieve superior lighting angles.

items.name: Heavy-Duty Truss Lift / Crank Stand
items.description: Elevate your lighting and video rigs safely and efficiently. These heavy-duty multi-mast crank stands provide immense mechanical advantage, allowing a single operator to hoist hundreds of pounds of loaded truss to heights exceeding 13 feet. Featuring an automatic friction brake winch, spring-loaded safety locking pins, and massive adjustable outrigger legs for leveling on uneven terrain, these lifts guarantee absolute structural safety and stability for your event.
specs: Safety: Automatic friction brake + lock pins

items.name: Artfox 4x4ft Modular Stage Deck (Adjustable Height)
items.description: Build a rock-solid foundation for your performers. Our premium 4x4-foot stage decks feature an 18mm anti-slip plywood surface capable of supporting a massive 800kg per square meter. The true advantage lies in the infinitely adjustable telescoping legs, which allow you to set the stage height anywhere from 2 to 3.3 feet, making it incredibly easy to achieve a perfectly level stage on uneven outdoor terrain or slopes.

items.name: Artfox Stage Deck Stairs (Adjustable)
items.description: Provide safe, professional access to your stage platform. These heavy-duty stage stairs lock securely into our Artfox 4x4 decks and perfectly match their adjustable heights, ensuring a seamless transition from the venue floor to the performance area.

items.name: 400A Three-Phase Power Distribution Rack
items.description: The beating heart of your production's power grid. This heavy-duty 400A Three-Phase Power Distro takes high-capacity Cam-Lok feeds from generators or venue tie-ins and safely routes it to your stage equipment. Featuring built-in circuit breakers for immediate backstage resetting, the unit provides multiple 19-pin Socapex outputs for overhead lighting grids and standard 20A Edison duplexes for stage-level gear. Housed in a rugged 21RU rolling rack, it ensures your rig receives clean, uninterrupted, and perfectly balanced power.

items.name: 50ft Socapex Extension Cable (19-Pin, 12 AWG)
items.description: Streamline your lighting rig's power infrastructure and eliminate the mess of extension cords. This heavy-duty 50-foot Socapex cable utilizes thick 12 AWG copper conductors to safely deliver six independent 20A power circuits through a single, crush-proof multipin snake. Perfect for feeding power from your distro directly to the truss grid.
specs: Wire Gauge: 12 AWG copper, PVC jacket

items.name: Socapex Breakout Cable (19-Pin to 6x Edison)
items.description: Distribute power cleanly across your truss. This breakout tail attaches to the end of a Socapex cable, splitting the single 19-pin connection into six clearly numbered standard 20A Edison (NEMA 5-15) receptacles. This allows you to plug your intelligent moving heads, strobes, and lasers directly into the local grid, minimizing cable clutter and weight.

cards.title: Response Window
